QuestData.Title: Soothing Spirits
QuestData.Description: This is a tragic land, with a history of violence and despair. While many of the dead roam in the flesh, some are simply lost souls, wandering in confusion.$B$BThey deserve to be put at ease.$B$BMany of these souls gather at the Addle Stead to the south, appearing before travelers. Take this censer of holy incense. Sway it before the forlorn spirits, and let the offering of its gentle scent give them peace.
QuestData.LogDescription: Use the Holy Censer to soothe 5 Forlorn Spirits at the Addle Stead.
QuestData.RewardText: You have brought peace to those who knew only misery, $n. Be proud.
